attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They are a drag on a housing market that is already almost dead; and serve no purpose except to increase the cost of selling- thereby stopping many sales altogether.They may be the kiss of death at a time when hardly any buyers or sellers are sure about house prices anyway. It has become a charge to find out if anyone is interested in buying a house.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
